name: Evil Islands - Lost in Astral
content:
files:
- demo: https://archive.org/download/eiaddondemo/EI_Addon_DEMO.exe
game:
  exe: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Nival Interactive/\u0417\u0430\u0442\u0435\u0440\
    \u044F\u043D\u043D\u044B\u0435 \u0432 \u0410\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u043B\u0435\
    \ (\u0434\u0435\u043C\u043E\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0441\u0438\u044F)/Starter.exe"
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    env:
      LANG: ru_RU.UTF-8
    executable: demo
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
system:
  env:
    LANG: ru_RU.UTF-8
